properties.title: Font Size
properties.name: fontSize
properties.info: Size of heading text in pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Padding
properties.name: padding
properties.info: Internal space around text in pixels, em, or rem. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Margin
properties.name: margin
properties.info: External space around text. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Text Align
properties.name: textAlign
properties.info: Aligns text left, right, or center

properties.title: Width
properties.name: width
properties.info: Width of heading text in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Height
properties.name: height
properties.info: Height of heading text in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Line Height
properties.name: lineHeight
properties.info: Line height of text in pixels, em, or rem.
